contents.item: No amount of service we do can impress God, only our service to ordinary people can
Service to humanity is the key to gaining the Kingdom of God
Stop wasting your life and discover who you are
Love requires fellowship and relationship with people
Never exchange your life for a penny
It is impossible to pause, stop or delay time
We are all called to promote God’s Kingdom on earth
What is life to Spirit, is death to the ego.
contents.owner: Vivian Amis, I Am: The Key to Manifesting

contents.item: You have to discover your area of talent to be effective
The earth you subdue becomes your kingdom
Time wasters are life wasters
Break free from the contract of employment
Speed is the ability to take a decision in a few seconds
Not to live a kingdom life is to live a wasted life
Your net worth determines how valuable you are in the sight of men
We bring glory to the Kingdom when we fellowship with one another
You get answers and solutions to your problems when you begin to notice God
Always take an inventory of your life
Purpose is the most important thing worth living for
The principle of God is love and honor
Losing your job brings you closer to your destiny
A life without increase, production and multiplication is a wasted one
We fellowship with God when we fellowship with people
Intensity is the extreme application of force and strength
Your calling is buried in your background and life experience
Work to fulfill destiny
Your intensity increases your net worth
Your calling is concealed in you and has to be discovered by you alone
Pursuit Of Knowledge Is An Attempt To Discover Established Principles Of The Kingdom Of God
Our attitude to others dictates God’s attitude to us
You dishonor God when you don’t treat His people with love
We were sent to earth to fulfill our mandate and life’s purpose
Brotherly love should be our number one principle as believers
Your intensity increases your productivity
Always celebrate people for who they are
You must detach yourself from the stereotypical life to live an effective one
The best way to celebrate God is to glorify His creation
Be eager to explore new discoveries
Don’t fellowship with people around you alone, explore and reach out to more people
We reject God when we reject people
You need speed to regain your lost years
You don’t need any confirmation if you are already in the spirit
Your calling is in what you can do without noticing time
You only honor and worship God when you do things without expecting anything in return
Reflect and meditate on yourself and discover ways to multiply yourself
Effectiveness of life is not in self aggrandising
It is only when you trust in God that you can make it life
The effectiveness of your life is determined by your ability to convert your time into values
You can only see God when you notice people
The doctrine of waiting for confirmation is one of the greatest time killers
Survival isn’t all there is to life
There is no limitation in God
Purposefully dedicating time into developing yourself is one of the keys to being effective in life
We are all qualified to fellowship with God no matter our situation or condition
An effective life is a fulfilled one
There is no interaction without God with interaction with men
Everyone should be seen as a carrier of God’s nature
To live an effective life, you must understand the essence and secret of life
Living in active consciousness is being in the “here and now
Work is an instrument through which you build yourself
The proof of your love for God is seen in your service to men
Your calling should be combined with your passion
You cannot appreciate God without appreciating people
You only work right when you are fulfilling the essence of your creation
The life in our possession is our time
The effectiveness of your life is determined by how much impact you make
Living for your purpose is equivalent to living for the Kingdom of God
Love is the greatest attribute of God
Find time to meditate and see how you can improve your life and achieve your goals
We should see our calling as our life’s major assignment
God will not come from Heaven to help us, but He’ll use the people around us for that
Fellowship with human beings opens up to fellowship with God
We cannot glorify God when we refuse to celebrate others
Your calling is your natural area of concentration
The principle of God is love
Man is the carrier of God’s image
You need to live a life of service to make your life an effective one
We celebrate God when we share in each other’s joy and pain
Glorifying people is the most noble act
Man’s inner content is the worth of his life
Life is about pursuing the essence of creation
You love God by showing love to His creations
Life is not about longevity but about effectiveness
Good things come your way when you serve the people around you
Love others the way God loves you
An effective life is a selfless one
Our life mandate on earth is carrying out our purpose
The worship of God is in our attitude to people
Serving people is more important to God than the religious activities we engage in
Effectiveness of life should be measured by the results in the area of your calling or purpose
